patterns.pattern: Teardown dynamic TCP translation from @STRING:ingressNIC@:@IPv4:sourceIpV4@/@NUMBER:sourcePort@ to @STRING:egressNIC@:@IPv4:destinationIpV4@/@NUMBER:destinationPort@ duration @ANYSTRING:duration@
Teardown dynamic UDP translation from @STRING:ingressNIC@:@IPv4:sourceIpV4@/@NUMBER:sourcePort@ to @STRING:egressNIC@:@IPv4:destinationIpV4@/@NUMBER:destinationPort@ duration @ANYSTRING:duration@

Teardown TCP connection @NUMBER:connectionID@ for @STRING:ingressNIC@:@IPv4:sourceIpV4@/@NUMBER:sourcePort@ to @STRING:egressNIC@:@IPv4:destinationIpV4@/@NUMBER:destinationPort@ duration @STRING@:@STRING@:@STRING@ bytes @STRING:totalBytes@

Teardown UDP connection @NUMBER:connectionID@ for @STRING:ingressNIC@:@IPv4:sourceIpV4@/@NUMBER:sourcePort@ to @STRING:egressNIC@:@IPv4:destinationIpV4@/@NUMBER:destinationPort@ duration @STRING@:@STRING@:@STRING@ bytes @STRING:totalBytes@
